DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective characterize relative bioavailability kinetic profile wild blueberry polyphenols 24-hours period . Secondary objective examine relationship bioavailability kinetic profile wild blueberry polyphenols marker chronic disease .
DOC.brief_title: Characterization Wild Blueberry Polyphenols Bioavailability Kinetic Profile Over 24-hour Period
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , single blind , 2-arm , within-subjects , placebo-controlled design utilize multiple sampling , repeat measure paradigm characterize bioavailability kinetic profile wild blueberry polyphenols . A planned sample size 12 enrol study . This study require one initial screen visit , one pre-study visit , 2 study visit . This study take approximately 3-4 week per subject complete . The initial screening visit provide subject inform consent document determine subject eligibility anthropometric measurement , vital sign , fast blood glucose test ( finger prick ) , completion survey relate general eating , health , exercise habit . If willing eligible participate , 3-day food record ( 2 weekday 1 weekend day ) instruct Screening Visit collect Pre-study visit ass subject ' baseline dietary intake pattern . Subjects instruct follow strictly limit polyphenolic diet 7 day prior study throughout participation time , maintain usual diet pattern physical activity , counsel staff investigator and/or Registered Dietitian . A dinner meal provide day study visit control second meal effect food beverage intake night study visit . Subject arrive center fast state least 10 hour , well hydrate rest . Each study visit require blood draw throughout visit . After evaluation subject 's health status ( via anthropometric , vital sign blood glucose measurement in-person interview ) , register nurse place catheter subject 's arm purpose multiple blood sample collection take initial blood draw fast state . Subjects randomize receive placebo wild blueberry beverage treatment base randomize treatment sequence 2 study visit along 3 standard meal ( breakfast , lunch dinner ) . The sequence receive beverage treatment visit randomly assign one two follow sequence : placebo-wild blueberry wild blueberry-placebo . Each study visit involve blood sample collection time point 0 ( fast ) , 0.25 , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 8 , 9 , 10 24 hour ( h ) assessment change plasma metabolites wild blueberry polyphenols influence metabolic inflammation marker . Also , urine sample collect prior study treatment baseline void 6 time period , 0 2 h , 2 4 h , 4 6 h , 6 8 h , 8 10h 10 24 h study visit ass wild blueberry polyphenolic metabolite .
DOC.criteria: 2045 year age Body Mass Index ( BMI ) range 25 33 kg/m2 Nonsmoker No clinical evidence cardiovascular , metabolic , respiratory , renal , gastrointestinal hepatic disease Not take medication would interfere outcomes study , i.e . lipid lower medication , antiinflammatory drug , dietary supplement , etcâ€¦ Able provide inform consent Able comply perform procedure request protocol Weight stable : gain lose weight +/ 5 kg previous 3 month Men woman smoke Past smoker : abstinence minimum 2 year Men woman know suspected food intolerance , allergy hypersensitivity Men woman know have/diagnosed diabetes mellitus Men woman fast blood glucose concentration > 110mg/dL Men woman uncontrolled blood pressure > 120 mmHg/80 mmHg Men woman document vascular disease , e.g. , heart failure , myocardial infarction , stroke , angina , related surgery , etc ... Men woman cancer nonmelanoma skin cancer previous 5 year Women know pregnant intend become pregnant course study Women lactate Taking medication dietary supplement may interfere outcome study ; e.g. , antioxidant supplement , antiinflammation , lipid lower medication , blood pressure lower medication , etc ... Subjects may choose go dietary supplement ( require 30 day washout ) ; e.g. , fish oil , probiotic , etc ... Men woman donate blood within 3 month Screening Visit blood donors/participants participation study result donate 1500 milliliter blood previous 12 month . Men woman vegan Substance ( alcohol drug ) abuse within last 2 year Excessive coffee tea consumer ( > 4 cups/d ) berry consumer ( > 2 cup fresh/day Men woman excessive exercise regularly athlete Unstable weight : gain lose weight +/ 5 kg previous 3 month Women take unstable dose brand hormonal contraceptive and/or stable dose brand less 6 month .
